name: VZ200 Ghosts 'N Goblins
description:
Ghosts 'N Goblins for the computers known as VTech Laser 300 / Dick Smith VZ200 / Seltron 200 / Texet TX8000 / Salora Fellow.

The kingdom has been overrun by nasty, evil monsters!
Can you fight all of the baddies in the land and save the princess? GIVE IT A GO!

Keys:

Q / A = Up/Down

N / M = Left/Right

Z = Fire

Space = Jump

Also works with Joystick 1 or 2.

This is a flipscreen version featuring most screens from the Commodore 64 version of G'N'G.

It was created with the Multi-Platform Arcade Game Designer. The VZ200 engine was created by Jason Oakley and Kees van Oss.

Check out the Blue Bilby website for more retro games on different platforms!
